input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt

Product features:
100% Cotton
Machin Wash / Tumble Dry
100% Combed Cotton With Soft Underside Cotton Lining
SOFT & HEAVY Perfect Weight For Underwear Layering or Outer / Nightshirt
Bright White Thermal Flat Knit Fabric Crew with Stay Flat Collar
Felxible Hold in Place wrist openings
Super Value Pack of 6 Long Sleeve Thermal Crews - Save Big
Great for College / Winter Travel or no time for Laundry
Recommend buying a size up if a more roomy generous fit

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Hey there, fellow style-savvy gents! 👋 We've got a real treat for you today - the Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt! 😍 Not only does it sound like a mouthful, but it's also a total game-changer for your wardrobe. 🔥

First off, let's talk about the material. This baby is made from 100% cotton, so you know it's gonna be soft and comfy. The mach wash and tumble dry feature means you can easily clean and maintain it, and the 100% combed cotton with soft underside cotton lining? 😍 It's like wearing a cloud, dude! 🎉

Now, let's talk about the fit. The flexible hold-in-place wrist openings and stay flat collar make it perfect for layering under your favorite jackets, hoodies, or even as a nightshirt. And with six shirts in the pack, you'll have enough to last you through the week, no problem! 💪

But wait, there's more! The bright white thermal flat knit fabric is not only stylish, but it's also super warm and cozy. Plus, the crew neck design makes it easy to layer or wear on its own. And don't even get us started on the soft, heavy weight - it's like wearing your favorite hoodie, but way more stylish! 😎

The best part? This bad boy is a super value pack, so you're getting six shirts for the price of one! 💸 It's perfect for college students, winter travelers, or anyone who doesn't have time for laundry. Heck, it's perfect for anyone who wants to look and feel great, am we right? 😉

So, what are you waiting for? Get your hands on the Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt today and level up your wardrobe game! �
input_text.Response B: The Andrew Scott Men's 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt will keep you warm and comfortable all season long. Made with 100% combed cotton and a soft underside cotton lining, these thermal crew necks are perfect for underwear layering or as an outer/nightshirt. The stay flat collar and flexible hold-in-place wrist openings provide added comfort, while the bright white thermal flat knit fabric is both stylish and functional. With a heavy weight of 7.8 oz, these shirts are perfect for colder weather. Save big with this super value pack of 6 long sleeve thermal crews. Machine wash and tumble dry for easy care.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
